message: Let's start with this fair offer, Bob. I believe we both win if we settle this quickly.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, Alice.  We both lose out if this drags on.
Bob, we're losing money by dragging this out. This offer is reasonable and will save us both some value.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Let's end this before we lose even more.
